name: Midnight
victoryScreenHeader: Fulfill your Divine mission and purify the land for Alexei's return.
victoryString: You've successfully brought Alexei Romanov back, now he can lead Holy Russia on a crusade to unify our world and cleanse it completely...
defeatString: The Holy Roman Empire has brought back a dead man from the grave! This is an unprecedented event! They'll soon wipe us all out in their quest to purify the world!
